sentences.en: Across the industry, occupancy rates have dropped about 10 percent Carew said.
sentences.cn: 整个行业, 住房率已下降10%左右,卡鲁说.

sentences.en: Attention should be given to their concerns for occupancy?
sentences.cn: 置业关注办理入住应注意 什么 ?

sentences.en: During the winter months, the occupancy rate is down to 50.
sentences.cn: 冬季的几个月里, 客房率降到50%.

sentences.en: He took uninterrupted occupancy of this position for ten years.
sentences.cn: 他持续担任这一职位10年.

sentences.en: Hotel Manager : The advertised rate is based on double occupancy.
sentences.cn: 广告上所说的价格是按两个人一间房算的.

sentences.en: Hotel occupancy has been as low as 40%.
Hotel occupancy rose once again in first nine months of 2003.
sentences.cn: 酒店入住率于二零零三年首九个月再度攀升.

sentences.en: Hotels in Tokyo enjoy over 90% occupancy.
sentences.cn: 东京的宾馆入住率高达90%以上。

sentences.en: Many hotels are reporting far lower occupancy - rates than they had expected.
sentences.cn: 许多旅馆称 入住 率比预期的要低得多.

sentences.en: Prices are based on full occupancy of a studio or apartment.
sentences.cn: 价格是建立在公寓的完全入住率之上的.

sentences.en: Prices are based on full occupancy of an apartment.
sentences.cn: 公寓租金按全部住满为基础计算。

sentences.en: The carpet had grown only more ragged during the two years of their joint occupancy.
sentences.cn: 地毯比两年前他们开始同居的时候,更加破了.

sentences.en: The occupancy for each show fell 4 percent.
sentences.cn: 每场电影的上座率降低了4%.

sentences.en: The occupancy rate of beds has been averaging out about 80 percent.
sentences.cn: 病床占用率平均保持在80%左右.

sentences.en: This process also creates a coordinated route to post - occupancy evaluation.
sentences.cn: 这个过程与使用后评价是并列的.

sentences.en: Tour operators report low occupancy rates.
sentences.cn: 旅游业经营者反映客房入住率低。

words.tran_cn: 已占用的；使用中的；无空闲的

trans.tran_cn: 占有，占领，居住，[物]占有率，占据期间
trans.tran_en: the number of people who stay, work, or live in a room or building at the same time
